title: Stones River National Battlefield: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger               Be A Junior Ranger         Subscribe  | What is RSS    Date: April 3, 2016  Contact: Jim Lewis, 615-893-9501  Contact: John McKay, 615-893-9501        We invite children of all ages to experience the history and nature on the battlefield by completing the fun filled activities in our Junior Ranger booklet. If you complete at least six activities at or above your age level, you'll earn a Junior Ranger badge. Complete ten or more activities, and you'll also receive a special patch.   You can pick up a Junior Ranger booklet at our visitor center. You can also download an print the booklet. Bring it with you, or use our website to help you complete the activities and become a virtual Junior Ranger.
